title:
Algebraically trivial automorphisms of irreducible holomorphic
  symplectic manifolds
abstract:
We extend the lattice-theoretic approach of Brandhorst--Cattaneo to classify
algebraically trivial actions on the known IHS manifolds, up to deformation and
birational conjugacy. In particular, we classify even order algebraically
trivial non symplectic automorphisms, with or without trivial discriminant
action. In the case of nontrivial discriminant actions, we show that such
automorphisms exist only for finitely many known deformation types and orders.
